mapper.select: SELECT id, scenic_name, ticket_content, scenic_address, ticket_price, ticket_link, score, img_url, city_id, supplier_id_id as supplier_id FROM ProductDT_ticketsmsg
SELECT id, scenic_name, ticket_content, scenic_address, ticket_price, ticket_link, score, img_url, city_id, supplier_id_id as supplier_id FROM ProductDT_ticketsmsg WHERE scenic_name = #{scenic_name}
SELECT id, scenic_name, ticket_content, scenic_address, ticket_price, ticket_link, score, img_url, city_id, supplier_id_id as supplier_id FROM ProductDT_ticketsmsg WHERE city_id = #{city_id}
